means: 减轻，缓解，缓和( alleviate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It is always completely alleviated by total gastrectomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 全胃切除永远完全缓解症状.

sentence.Network_en: Toxicity problem in manufacturing and storage might be alleviated by coating beryllium with aluminum.
sentence.Network_cn: 但如果用铝包覆铍,则可避免加工过程中及储存期间的中毒问题.

sentence.Network_en: Atrophy in group C alleviated and bacterial translocation rate declined ( 37.5 % ) .
sentence.Network_cn: C组较B组 肠黏膜萎缩减轻,黏膜DNA、 RNA含量和浆细胞数目增加,mln细菌 培养阳性率 37.5%,肠细菌移位率下降.

PerfectNetExp.abs: It is always completely alleviated by total gastrectomy ., 全胃切除永远完全缓解症状.
they alleviated the boredom of waiting by singing songs ., 他们以唱歌来减轻等候的厌烦.
aspirin that alleviated the smart ;, 减轻刺痛的阿斯匹林.
and can be alleviated by taking a more proactive stance ., 而采取积极的态度可以减轻这种症状.

英语环境专业术语3... ... alkyne 炔；链炔烃 alleviating measures 缓和措施；减轻措施 allowable daily intake 容许日摄入量.
flood abatement 消洪；灭洪flood alleviation 缓洪flood control 防洪；洪水控制

entry.def: If you alleviate pain, suffering, or an unpleasant condition, you make it less intense or severe.

example.ex: Nowadays, a great deal can be done to alleviate back pain.
example.tran: 如今，减轻背部疼痛可以有许多方法。

means.word_mean: 1. (of pain or sorrow) made easier to bear

auth_sentence.content: Symptoms which can be greatly alleviated with the use of antidepressants.
auth_sentence.res_content: Symptoms which can be greatly alleviated with the use of antidepressants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Symptoms which can be greatly alleviated with the use of antidepressants.

auth_sentence.content: This could be alleviated by spreading the arrays out a little.
auth_sentence.res_content: This could be alleviated by spreading the arrays out a little.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This could be alleviated by spreading the arrays out a little.

auth_sentence.content: Constipation may be alleviated by consuming foods rich in fibre and starchy carbohydrates, as well as plenty of fluids.
auth_sentence.res_content: Constipation may be alleviated by consuming foods rich in fibre and starchy carbohydrates, as well as plenty of fluids.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Constipation may be alleviated by consuming foods rich in fibre and starchy carbohydrates, as well as plenty of fluids.

Sentence.sentence: But some of the consequences can be alleviated.
